name: Presentation Slides
description:
- Presentation title

- Section title

- One-column layout

- Three-columns

- 2:1 layout

- Gallery

- Quote

How to use:


1. Export your presentation to PDF by clicking `Menu > File > Export frames to PDF...`

2. Link your slides in Prototype mode and use Present mode to show them.
